title: Escape From Terra (PDF ebook and raw images)
description:
This is all 985 strips of the web comic _Escape From Terra_, including
full transcripts. It's compiled into a single, professional-looking PDF
ebook.
 <a href="
http://www.bigheadpress.com/eft" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.bigheadpress.com/eft</a>

_Escape From Terra_ is a continuing story set in the late 21st
Century, and concerns humanity's advance both through outer space and
social evolution. People living in the frontier are liberated from
traditional power structures and free to develop new customs and rules
as may suit them -- although the United World government on Terra
(Earth) is envious of colonial success and anxious to establish its
grip on human lives and wealth as far as it can.
